oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Word combination lexicons
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wroclaw University of Science and Technology
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: multi-word units
lexicalisation
phraseology
idiom
terminology
corpus linguistics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 10 lexicons comprising of several hundreds word combinations exhibiting various stages of lexicalisation (from free word combinations to fixed idioms) manually annotated by many linguists according to linguistic criteria (like semantic compositionality, syntactic idiosyncracy, terminological nature etc.) and intuitive sense of lexicalisation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Wroclaw University of Science and Technology
